LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_EnableCompression_Label: Enable event text compression (WIP - coming soon, toggle currently does nothing)
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_EnableCompression_Toolt: Use compressed event text to reduce token usage when sending quests and events to RimTalk.
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_Compression_Description:
When enabled, Event+ will compress long, repetitive quest descriptions while keeping key facts.
Example (refugee hospitality quest): - Before: A long multi-paragraph letter explaining who the refugees are, why they fled, how long they will stay, and that they will work and fight for free... - After: A short summary like: "The colony accepted the refugees. They fled for [reason], will stay for X days to rest, and will work and fight for free during that time."
When disabled, Event+ always sends the full original event text.
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_CategoryFilters_Desc: Enable or disable entire event categories. Disabled categories are completely hidden from the AI, overriding all settings below.
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_TypeBasedFiltering_Desc: Hide all events of selected types globally, across all saves
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_InstanceBasedFiltering_: Hide specific active events in this save. Only available when a save is loaded. May include event types that are already excluded from RimTalk conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_CurrentEventsNote: Shows only events currently active in your game. Only available when a save is loaded. May include event types that are already excluded from RimTalk conversations.
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_AllEventTypesNote: Shows all possible event types from loaded mods. May include event types that are already excluded from RimTalk conversations, even if active in your game (e.g., background timers, diplomacy quests).
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_QuickFilter_Sites: World Sites (bandit camps, item stashes, etc.)
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_InstanceFiltersCleared: Cleared {0} instance filter(s) across all saves.
